channel.title: Offical Arrav Re-make! (In Development!)
channel.description:
[CENTER]
[size=24pt]First of all, this project thread isn't completed. This is just a bit of whats going on i will be updating + adding things & organizing it daily.[/size]
[size=36pt]Project started on: 1/19/13 Release date: 2/25/13 [/size] [size=large]Also i'm searching for Developers to work with me. Private message me![/size]
[URL=http://"http://verprex.org/forums/"][size=18pt]REGISTER AND STAY UPDATED HERE![/size][/URL]
[CODE] updated all teleports + new spots for each particular teleport added new reset skill interface client + server sided. added new anime so when play gets up from "resting" it stands up first instead of just skipping the standing up part. new skill tab for summoning. added pouch creation added scrolls for summoning added summoning tab option to choose from old or new x10 hit numbers added full screen added items into slayer shop configured slayer system rewrote combat formula added 317 maps removed 508 maps new password interface added 6 more bosses started dung base Started summoning base Re done pkp points system to function properly. Re done voting system to fuction properly. Added levels reset npc Added lock xp Added resting Voting system with callbacks Voting points system Triple Xp week Triple Pkp week Tweaked up prices Re did the forums. Added more categories and forums. uploaded client download. uploaded client cache. Working on homepage css from scratch. Added pkp shop. Fixed a deadlock & null bug. Re done slayer system. Added interface for help in quest tab. Fixed Pvp Dupe 100% Dung in progress Summoning in progress Added whos online command + inerface Added Commands list + interface [/CODE]
New friends + ignore list on the same tab!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tqEHsae.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/D49aH3o.png[/img]
New summoning orb
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mLYGXRP.png[/img]
New slayer shop + items 100% working
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tNwAQGP.png[/img]
New reset a skill interface
[IMG]http://img854.imageshack.us/img854/1851/bf1cd7dcea2a421fbc1feba.png[/img]
updated skills tab to add summoning skill
[IMG]http://img23.imageshack.us/img23/1275/1c60eba90fc14bd3b79c034.png[/img]
New pouch creating interface + server sided 100%
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wSH8LkV.png[/img]
New summoning tab [IMG]http://img838.imageshack.us/img838/6261/51caa014a0664338a3196da.png[/img]
100% BoB! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GWLqG6l.png[/img]
Dung token shop [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/q2xD0bw.png[/img]
New changepassword interface. (: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/07krh7Z.png[/img]
More places for charms. :D [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JSX7P10.png[/img]
New boots! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ChS5Fz4.png[/img] [/CENTER]

item.title: Offical Arrav Re-make! (In Development!)
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:15, topic:480722”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=598959.msg4211132#msg4211132 date=1359567502]
A guy who works with me on my new RSPS asked him, here’s the conversation: http://puu.sh/1UrLi

I didn’t think they would’ve fined him 200k lol.
[/quote]
He was within a conversation with me, and few of the Arrav developers when we talked about his consequences. At first, he wasn’t allowed to give out the official amount but I suppose he didn’t care after.[/quote]
Oh I seee, either way, 17k is a lot.

Read full topic

item.title: Offical Arrav Re-make! (In Development!)
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:14, topic:480722”]A guy who works with me on my new RSPS asked him, here’s the conversation: http://puu.sh/1UrLi

I didn’t think they would’ve fined him 200k lol.[/quote]
He was within a conversation with me, and few of the Arrav developers when we talked about his consequences. At first, he wasn’t allowed to give out the official amount but I suppose he didn’t care after.

Read full topic

item.title: Offical Arrav Re-make! (In Development!)
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:12, topic:480722”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=598959.msg4211125#msg4211125 date=1359567041]
I don’t blame him, I’d be pretty pissed off if I got fined 200 grand, lol. That sucks man, there’ll be other servers though.
[/quote]
The least of my worries, I’ve been offered multiple positions because I was the manager for Arrav. And he and the second founder ended up being fined 17k EURO (not sure what that is in USD). And then, the developers that had signed a contract with Arrav (after Rene made a company), were signed to not use or do RSPS again.[/quote]
A guy who works with me on my new RSPS asked him, here’s the conversation: http://puu.sh/1UrLi

I didn’t think they would’ve fined him 200k lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Offical Arrav Re-make! (In Development!)
item.dc:creator: @ou08tlaw ou08tlaw
item.description:
@ou08tlaw wrote:

There is already a Arrav server owned by a developer of Arrav so goodluck.

item.title: Offical Arrav Re-make! (In Development!)
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Ruby:

I don’t blame him, I’d be pretty pissed off if I got fined 200 grand, lol. That sucks man, there’ll be other servers though.

The least of my worries, I’ve been offered multiple positions because I was the manager for Arrav. And he and the second founder ended up being fined 17k EURO (not sure what that is in USD). And then, the developers that had signed a contract with Arrav (after Rene made a company), were signed to not use or do RSPS again.

Read full topic

item.title: Offical Arrav Re-make! (In Development!)
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:10, topic:480722”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=598959.msg4211108#msg4211108 date=1359564067]
I highly, highly, highly doubt he has Arrav’s client. I’m sure Rene will show face soon enough and prove this.
[/quote]
Rene doesn’t show his face around much anymore after the lawsuit. Sadly, I was there through the entire process and had to resign from Arrav after getting caught-up with some real life things.[/quote]
I don’t blame him, I’d be pretty pissed off if I got fined 200 grand, lol. That sucks man, there’ll be other servers though.

Read full topic

item.title: Offical Arrav Re-make! (In Development!)
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:8, topic:480722”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=598959.msg4211097#msg4211097 date=1359562187]
Good luck facing Jagex’s team of lawyers. They shut down Arrav for a reason, you’ll be shut down and probably fined the same amount.
[/quote]
I doubt he has Arrav’s client (the reason Arrav was shut down).[/quote]
I highly, highly, highly doubt he has Arrav’s client. I’m sure Rene will show face soon enough and prove this.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist

vManlyMan:

item.title: Offical Arrav Re-make! (In Development!)
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:4, topic:480722”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=598959.msg4210956#msg4210956 date=1359539023]
I am almost sure that the original owner and developers are releasing arrav under a new name, or something of the sort.
[/quote]
No. The original owner and developers were fined, and since I didn’t sign a contract with them I’m not held under that bullshit. Also, this is retarded, what’s the point of doing this? You don’t have ANY reason to “remake” Arrav.[/quote]

What reason is their to make any RSPS?

Read full topic

item.title: Offical Arrav Re-make! (In Development!)
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

I am almost sure that the original owner and developers are releasing arrav under a new name, or something of the sort.

No. The original owner and developers were fined, and since I didn’t sign a contract with them I’m not held under that bullshit. Also, this is retarded, what’s the point of doing this? You don’t have ANY reason to “remake” Arrav.

Read full topic

@Verprex wrote:

[CENTER]

[size=24pt]First of all, this project thread isn’t completed.
This is just a bit of whats going on i will be updating + adding things & organizing it daily.[/size]

[size=36pt]Project started on: 1/19/13
Release date: 2/25/13
[/size]
[size=large]Also i’m searching for Developers to work with me.
Private message me![/size]

[size=18pt]REGISTER AND STAY UPDATED HERE![/size]

updated all teleports + new spots for each particular teleport
added new reset skill interface client + server sided.
added new anime so when play gets up from "resting" it stands up first instead of just skipping the standing up part.
new skill tab for summoning.
added pouch creation
added scrolls for summoning
added summoning tab
option to choose from old or new x10 hit numbers
added full screen
added items into slayer shop
configured slayer system
rewrote combat formula
added 317 maps
removed 508 maps
new password interface
added 6 more bosses
started dung base
Started summoning base
Re done pkp points system to function properly.
Re done voting system to fuction properly.
Added levels reset npc
Added lock xp
Added resting
Voting system with callbacks
Voting points system
Triple Xp week
Triple Pkp week
Tweaked up prices
Re did the forums.
Added more categories and forums.
uploaded client download.
uploaded client cache.
Working on homepage css from scratch. 
Added pkp shop.
Fixed a deadlock & null bug.
Re done slayer system.
Added interface for help in quest tab.
Fixed Pvp Dupe 100%
Dung in progress
Summoning in progress
Added whos online command + inerface
Added Commands list + interface

New friends + ignore list on the same tab!


New summoning orb

New slayer shop + items 100% working

New reset a skill interface

updated skills tab to add summoning skill

New pouch creating interface + server sided 100%

New summoning tab

100% BoB!

Dung token shop

New changepassword interface. (:

More places for charms.

New boots!

[/CENTER]
